Name: The Breach: A VR Escape Game
About the game: The Breach is a Virtual Reality Escape Game in which you will explore two different rooms to figure out how to repair a leaking antimatter reactor. This adventure is specifically designed for VR and focuses on the immersion of the player, without needing any prior VR experience. Once you pass the tutorial explaining you the situation in more depth, you will quickly feel transported in a whole new world. The game has been thoroughly tested by multiple people of various profiles, from complete beginners to veterans of VR and Escape Rooms. None had major issues with the feeling or the difficulty of the game.
